references: R. C. Read, On the enumeration of a class of plane multigraphs, Aequat. Math., 31 (1986), 47-63.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
prog: (PARI) { s =y ; for(loop=1,18, p = 1 ; forstep(i= 1,2*loop-1,2, sigmai = polcoeff(s,i,y) ; if(i==2*loop-1, print1(sigmai,",") ; ) ; n=0 ; tmp = 0 ; while(i*n <=2*loop-1, ff = 1 ; for(k=1,n, ff *= (-sigmai-k+1)/k ; ) ; tmp += ff*(-y)^(i*n) ; n++ ; ) ; p *= tmp : ) ; b = y-s ; forstep(i=1,2*loop-1,2, b += polcoeff(p,i,y)*y^i ; ) ; s = y ; for(r=0,loop-1, for(i=0,2*loop+1, s += polcoeff(b^(3+2*r),i,y)*y^i ; ) ; ) ; ) ; } - _R. J. Mathar_, Apr 24 2006
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: More terms from _R. J. Mathar_, Apr 24 2006
